amendment.description: To provide reimbursement for Federally qualified health centers participating in medicare manged care.

vote.text: Amendment SA 972 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 1. Record Vote Number: 242.

action.text: Amendment SA 972 proposed by Senator Bingaman for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S8336-8337; text: CR S8336) To provide reimbursement for Federally qualified health centers participating in medicare manged care.
